sentences.en: Ballpark estimates indicate a price tag of $90 million a month.
sentences.cn: 大致的估计费用为每月9,000万美元。

sentences.en: Each month the total prize kitty is £13.5 million.
sentences.cn: 每个月的彩池奖金总额达1,350万英镑。

sentences.en: He's accused of misusing $17.5 million from a secret government slush fund.
sentences.cn: 他被指控滥用秘密的政府行贿基金，金额达1,750万美元。

sentences.en: Her old man left her a few million when he died.
sentences.cn: 她老爸去世时留给了她好几百万。

sentences.en: I'm broke, Livy, and I owe a couple of million dollars.
sentences.cn: 我破产了，莉薇，而且我欠了几百万美元的债。

sentences.en: In 1986 more than three million were receiving unemployment benefit.
sentences.cn: 1986年，有300多万人领取失业救济金。

sentences.en: More than six million youngsters tune in to Blockbusters every day.
sentences.cn: 每天有600多万年轻人收看“热门大片”这档节目。

sentences.en: Police investigating a £10 million car insurance fiddle arrested 16 people yesterday.
sentences.cn: 调查涉及1,000万英镑的汽车保险诈骗案的警察昨天逮捕了16人。

sentences.en: Somalia, pop. 7.9 million, income per head about £1.60 a week.
sentences.cn: 索马里，人口790万，人均收入大约每周1.60英镑。

sentences.en: The book sold more than a million copies.
sentences.cn: 这本书售出了一百多万册。

sentences.en: The company has had to make redundancy payments of £472 million.
sentences.cn: 该公司不得不为裁员支付4.72亿英镑的补偿款。

sentences.en: The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
sentences.cn: 该疾病一下子就使4,000万只兔子丧命。

sentences.en: The new shopping centre was constructed at a cost of 1.1 million.
sentences.cn: 新建成的购物中心耗资110万。

sentences.en: The total cost of the project would be more than $240 million.
sentences.cn: 该项目的总成本会超过2.4亿美元。

sentences.en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
Unemployment is now a whisker away from three million.
sentences.cn: 现在的失业人数已接近300万。

words.tran_cn: 百万分之一的；第一百万的
百万富婆；百万富翁的妻子

phrases.tran_cn: 可能性极小；百万分之一
(人、物)千里挑一的，无与伦比的
(非正式)（人）看上去非常好的；感觉非常好的
百里挑一；极稀有的人或事
